cards.front: What are parametric equations?
cards.back: Equations where $x$ and $y$ are defined separately by functions of a third variable (parameter $t$): $x = f(t)$, $y = g(t)$

cards.back: Both $dx/dt$ and $dy/dt$ are continuous and not simultaneously zero

What is a vector-valued function?
cards.back: Function of form $\vec{r}(t) = \langle f(t), g(t) \rangle$ or $\vec{r}(t) = f(t)\vec{i} + g(t)\vec{j}$

What is curvature $\kappa$ of a curve?
cards.back: Measure of how sharply curve bends: $\kappa = \left\|\frac{d\vec{T}}{ds}\right\| = \frac{\|\vec{T}'(t)\|}{\|\vec{r}'(t)\|}$
